name: Save Zombie (FidgetLand)
description:
• You are playing for a knight and you should save zombie. 

Level by level - it's will be harder, capacity of enemies grows, their health - grows, the distance to player detection increases. 

Here 2 ways how to win a game: 1. Survive, save zombie and get to home; 2. Kill enemies.

If you or zombie gonna die - you can buy health repair for them.

Control buttons:

  • Moving - "WASD" or Arrows;
  • Kick - "Ctrl" or "Mouse 1";
  • Pause - "ESC";
  • Open Info Menu - "Q";
  • Open Shop Menu - "E";
  • Buy health for Player - "1";
  • But health for Zombie - "2".
